DOC.criteria: 1 . Female patient diagnosis systemic lupus erythematosus ( SLE ) accord criterion American Rheumatic Association , 1982 , age 1250 year , score SLEDAI ( Disease Active Index ) 12 ( include class V LN ) . 2 . Patients diagnose accord ISN/RPS 2003 classification criterion : class Ⅲ , Ⅳ , Ⅳ + Ⅴ , Ⅲ + Ⅴ LN renal biopsy within 3 month , CI〈 4，Scr〈 3 mg/dl . 3 . Patients proteinuria ≥ 1.5 g/24h , active urine sediment . 4 . Patients sign write informed consent form ( patient less 18 year old parents/legal representative ' signature ) , give consent follow study procedure followups . 1 . Patients receive treatment cytotoxic drug cyclophosphamide ( CTX ) , cyclosporine A 1 week within three month . 2 . Patients serum creatinine ≥ 3 mg/dl（265 μmol/L ) . 3 . Patients severe infection central nervous system symptom . 4 . Patients impaired liver function , ALT/GPT AST/GOT twice normal upper limit active hepatitis . 5 . Patients abnormal blood glucose , fast blood glucose > 6.2 mmol/L post meal blood glucose > 11.2 mmol/L . 6 . Patients pregnant lactate . 7 . Patients know allergic macrolide .
